channel.title: Publication and Patent on Nithya Shikarpur
channel.description: Recent content in Publication and Patent on Nithya Shikarpur

item.title: Tap Tap Revolution: A study of rhythm reproduction from jazz solos with visual aids
item.description: For my HCI course project in Fall 2022, I decided to study the role of visual aids such as piano roll and music notation in aiding the memorization and reproduction of note onset timings in a jazz improvisation with respect to a backing track.

item.title: Raga classification from vocal performance using multimodal analysis
item.description: Update: This paper won the ‘best special call paper award’ at ISMIR 2022.

item.title: Computational Analysis of Melodic Mode Switching
item.description: This work was done with Asawari Keskar and Dr. Preeti Rao at the Digital Audio Processing Lab, IIT Bombay .

item.title: Detection of Malware in Partially Downloaded Binary Files
item.description: From July 2019 to May 2020, I worked with Dr. Abhishek Tripathi as an intern at McAfee.

item.title: Malware Detection for IoT devices
item.description: From July 2019 to May 2020, I worked with Dr. Abhishek Tripathi as an intern at McAfee.
